content.p: The £40 million David Ross Sports Village offers an inspirational and accessible sports provision for all. The sports village has been supported by a significant commitment from Nottingham alumnus and Carphone Warehouse founder - David Ross. Getting involved with sports and exercise during your time at university has so many great benefits, like making new friends, building your confidence, trying something new and staying fit and healthy. Whether you’re a budding beginner or a seasoned pro athlete, we’re here to support all of our students. We are so proud of our brand new David Ross Sports Village, complete with the latest equipment and top-of-the-range facilities, with accessible sports provisions for all. Our Sports, Health and Wellbeing package is available for students living in university halls on University Park and Jubilee campus, Dagfa and Varsity. Our sports, health and well-being package provides a huge range of options to stay active during your time on campus with outstanding modern facilities and programmes located right on your doorstep.
